subject: Economy
question_en: What is the Gross Domestic Product (GDP) of Rajasthan in 2020-21?
explanation_en: The Gross Domestic Product (GDP) of Rajasthan in the financial year 2020-21 was Rs. 180,000 crores. This information is based on the data provided by the Ministry of Statistics and Program Implementation, Government of Rajasthan.
